title: Film
description: A film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe

release.description: The date of the films theatrical release

director.description: The name(s) of the film's director(s)

id.description: The unique identifier/index of the film

runtime.description: The runtime of the film in minutes

box-office-usa.description: The USA box office revenue produced by the film

box-office-world.description: The international box office revenue produced by the film

rotten-tomatoes-critic.description: The Rotten Tomatoes critic review average (tomatometer)

rotten-tomatoes-audience.description: The Rotten Tomatoes average audence score
